definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)

sentences.english: Stolen they had already been elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 況且那些東西是早已被人偷過了的。

sentences.english: But this girl was a non-believer.
sentences.chinese: 況且，這個女子是一個異教徒。

sentences.english: Anyway, I hadn't yet done what I'd come back to do.
sentences.chinese: 況且，我也還沒幹完我從鬼門關回來該做的事。

sentences.english: Past doomsday prophecies have often relied on religious beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 況且，過去世界末日的預言往往基於宗教信仰。

sentences.english: Besides this, Javert possessed in his eye the feline phosphorescence of night birds.
sentences.chinese: 況且沙威的眼睛有着夜鳥那種象貓一樣的磷光。

sentences.english: However, the letter said that Jo had been impolite and she could not speak French.
sentences.chinese: 然而，信上說喬曾對她無禮，況且她也不懂法語。

sentences.english: Besides, we ought to realize our parents' good intentions.
sentences.chinese: 況且我們應該體會父母的良苦用心。

sentences.english: I just used my Kungfu to change my pulse only, no big deal.
sentences.chinese: 況且我只用內力改變了自己的脈象罷了。

sentences.english: And anyway I don't want to beg for Edgar's help, or make trouble for him.
sentences.chinese: 況且反正我不想求艾加幫忙，說不定還會給他添麻煩。

sentences.english: And when Julio thinks about the way he looks, it's also a lot more positive.
sentences.chinese: 況且夏利奧想到自己的樣子時也表現得更加積極樂觀。

sentences.english: After all, the salaries of civil servants are paid with the tax handed in by citizens and they should represent people’s benefits.
sentences.chinese: 況且，公務員是代表羣衆利益拿着老白姓的納稅工資。

sentences.english: Also , the boat was so small that when I rowed , the waves came over the sides of the boat .
sentences.chinese: 況且船這麼小，我一劃，海浪就從船舷湧進來。

sentences.english: Moreover, I am sad. What do you wish me to say to you?
sentences.chinese: 況且我正在愁眉不展，你們要我談些什麼呢？

sentences.english: I don't want to be one of them. Besides this is transgressing a law knowingly.
sentences.chinese: 我不想成爲一分子，況且這是知法犯法。

sentences.english: Besides, class of period of the Warring States families status differentiating is extremely strict.
sentences.chinese: 況且，戰國時期階級門第的劃分是極其嚴格的。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
at the minimum/at the very least
